name: 布鲁斯·瓦比特
name_full: 布鲁斯·瓦比特 Bruce Wabbit

last_movies.title: 蝙蝠侠大战超人：正义黎明

introduction: Visual editor turned short filmmaker. Bruce grew up with a passion for British, Irish and American cinema. He migrated to New York City to later study film and production at NYU. Since then, he has worked in the industry primarily as a contract visual editor, working on a variety of film and television productions. Making a transition to cinematography and directing short films. Bruce saw success with his first multi-award winning amateur short film "Just To Be Frank" in the Film Festival circuit. He has gone on to produce multiple award winning short projects such as, "The Angriest Man In Town" "The Phone Plan" and "The High Standard". Bruce enjoys storytelling in the simplest form, but with a twist.
